title: License assignment modifications will no longer be supported in the Microsoft Entra Admin Center
description:
Starting on September 1st, 2024, the Microsoft Entra Admin Center and the Microsoft Azure Admin Portal will no longer support the modification of user and group license assignments. You will have read only access for license assignments in these portals moving forward. 
 If you want to modify user and group license assignments via user interface, you will need to visit the Microsoft 365 Admin Center (https://admin.microsoft.com). 
 Please note, this change will not impact our API and PowerShell modules.
